quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
author: Steven Wright

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Don’t follow your dreams. Follow my Instagram instead.
author: Random Influencer

quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
author: Cathy Guisewite

quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
author: Unknown

quote: Hard work never killed anyone, but why take the chance?
author: Edgar Bergen

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to take the stairs.
author: Joe Girard

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work for it.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t take life too seriously. You’ll never get out of it alive.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: If life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Always borrow money from a pessimist. They won’t expect it back.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.
author: Unknown

quote: Work hard in silence. Let your success be the noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of payments.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Don’t follow your dreams, follow the WiFi signal.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Never put off until tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Motivation gets you going, but habit keeps you growing.
author: John Maxwell

quote: You can’t have everything… where would you put it?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Life is like a sewer… what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
author: Tom Lehrer

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Sometimes the best inspiration is a deadline.
author: Unknown

quote: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t worry if plan A fails, there are 25 more letters in the alphabet.
author: Claire Cook

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: When nothing goes right, go left.
author: Unknown

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
author: Jimmy Johnson

quote: Always remember that you are unique, just like everyone else.
author: Unknown

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Change the world by being yourself.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Don’t give up on your dreams. Keep sleeping.
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: If you fall, I’ll be there. – The floor
author: Unknown

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The elevator to success is broken. Take the stairs… one painful step at a time.
author: Unknown

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I’m not so sure.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream big. Even if you fail, at least you failed dramatically.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you’ll land among the stars… which is actually billions of light years away and you’ll suffocate.
author: Corny Twist

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: If you’re not failing, you’re not trying. If you’re failing too much, maybe stop trying.
author: Me

quote: Believe in yourself, even when no one else does. Especially when no one else does.
author: Unknown

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Some people dream of success, others wake up and check Instagram.
author: Unknown

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you. Like opening your bank account.
author: Twisted Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with pizza.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try… and usually some coffee.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done. Or when Netflix drops a new season.
author: Unknown

quote: Hustle until your haters ask if you’re hiring.
author: Unknown

quote: I didn’t fail the test, I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
author: Benjamin Franklin (probably not)

quote: Do it now. Sometimes 'later' becomes 'never'.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to push you… unless you’re on a swing.
author: Unknown

quote: If you can’t beat them, arrange to have them beaten.
author: George Carlin

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there… because nobody actually wants to.
author: Unknown

quote: The future depends on what you do today.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight. Unless it’s leg day.
author: Unknown

quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them. Or you just sleep in.
author: Unknown

quote: When life closes a door, open it again. That’s how doors work.
author: Obvious Wisdom

quote: The grass is greener where you water it. Or where your neighbor waters it better.
author: Lawn Care Guru

quote: Don’t be a prisoner of your past. Unless your past is free food, then stay there.
author: Deep but Dumb

quote: Big journeys begin with small steps. Or a good WiFi connection.
author: Modern Explorer

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are. Unless you’re broke, then just nap.
author: Roosevelt Remix

quote: Every day may not be good, but there’s something good in every day. Like snacks.
author: Positive Snacker

quote: Don’t be afraid to fail. Be afraid of succeeding at something stupid.
author: Accidental Genius

quote: The comeback is always stronger than the setback. Unless you forget leg day.
author: Gym Bro

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn. Or sometimes you just cry in the shower.
author: Shower Philosopher

quote: A winner is just a loser who tried one more time. And had better WiFi.
author: E-Sports Coach

quote: Happiness is free. Unfortunately, rent is not.
author: Cold Reality

quote: Stars can’t shine without darkness. Or electricity.
author: Corny Sky Guy

quote: Success doesn’t come to you, you go to it. Unless Amazon delivers it.
author: Prime Hustler

quote: Pain is temporary. Internet screenshots are forever.
author: Social Media Philosopher

quote: Life doesn’t have to be perfect to be wonderful. But WiFi does.
author: Millennial Sage

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits. Unless your limit is pizza, then don’t.
author: Motivational Eater

quote: The secret to success? Show up. Preferably with coffee.
author: Office Survivor

quote: Turn your can’ts into cans, your dreams into memes, and your failures into content.
author: Influencer Mindset

quote: Work until you no longer need an introduction. Or until people mute you.
author: Corporate Poster

quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done. Or until someone else does it first.
author: Mandela Remix

quote: Don’t be the same, be better. Or at least funnier.
author: Life Hack Guy

quote: Happiness looks good on you. So does pizza grease.
author: Comfort Food Philosopher

quote: Success is like an iceberg. People only see your shiny Instagram posts.
author: Hustle Meme

quote: Your only limit is you. Unless it’s your credit card limit.
author: Finance Guru

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Unless what you have is expired milk.
author: Practical Dreamer

quote: Don’t be afraid to shine. Unless you’re bald in the sun.
author: Sunscreen Coach

quote: Failure builds character. Too much failure builds debt.
author: Broke Philosopher

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish. Stay hydrated.
author: Steve Jobs Remix

quote: Do something today your future self will thank you for. Or blame you for, depends.
author: Time Traveler

quote: A goal without a plan is just a wish. And a plan without action is just a to-do list you’ll ignore.
author: Planner Addict

quote: Don’t tell people your dreams. Show them… unless your dream is weird.
author: Motivation With Limits

quote: Everything happens for a reason. Sometimes the reason is you made a dumb choice.
author: Reality Check

quote: Consistency is key. Unless you’re consistently bad.
author: Coach Chaos

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it. Or steal it, who’s asking?
author: Ambitious Rebel

quote: Discipline is just choosing between what you want now and what you want later. I choose pizza now.
author: Food Philosopher

quote: Great things never came from comfort zones. Except pajamas.
author: Lazy Genius

quote: Don’t let the fear of failure stop you. Let laziness do that instead.
author: Truth Teller

quote: Success is not for the lazy. But naps are.
author: Nap Guru

quote: The road to success is always under construction. And full of potholes.
author: Frustrated Commuter

quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door. Or just check if the doorbell works.
author: DIY Philosopher

quote: Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase. Unless it’s Lego, then good luck.
author: Parental Wisdom

quote: Good things come to those who hustle. Better things come to those who order delivery.
author: Lazy Hustler

quote: Your future needs you. Your past just texts you at 2 AM.
author: Toxic Motivator

quote: Never stop learning. Unless it’s algebra, then please stop.
author: Math Hater

quote: The sky is not the limit. There are footprints on the moon. But my rent is still due.
author: Space Hustler

quote: Don’t just survive, thrive. Unless it’s Monday.
author: Weekend Enthusiast

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you. Or at least so loud they can’t.
author: Annoying Genius

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it. Or bribe it.
author: Shady Motivator

quote: Small steps every day. Unless it’s leg day, then crawl.
author: Gym Meme

quote: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn. Sometimes you just embarrass yourself.
author: Life Teacher
